definition: endowed with feeling and unstructured consciousness, to give new life or energy to
details:
adjective
- endowed with feeling and unstructured consciousness
= synonyms: sentient
- endowed with animal life as distinguished from plant life
= example: endowed with animal life as distinguished from plant life
- belonging to the class of nouns that denote living beings
= example: belonging to the class of nouns that denote living beings
verb
- to give new life or energy to
= example: to give new life or energy to
= synonyms: repair
- to make lively
= example: to make lively
= synonyms: invigorate, enliven, liven, liven up
- to give lifelike qualities to
= example: to give lifelike qualities to
= synonyms: animize, animise
- to heighten or intensify
= example: to heighten or intensify
= synonyms: inspire, invigorate, enliven, exalt
